string.name: message
string.value: ={{$json.body.message || $json.body.notes || $json.body.call_summary || $json.body.inquiry || $json.body.description || 'Contact information collected via VAPI outbound call'}}

additionalFields.companyName: ={{$node['Extract Contact Data'].json['company'] !== 'Company collected during call' ? $node['Extract Contact Data'].json['company'] : ''}}
additionalFields.industry: ={{$node['Extract Contact Data'].json['industry'] !== 'Industry discussed during call' ? $node['Extract Contact Data'].json['industry'] : ''}}
additionalFields.message: ={{$node['Extract Contact Data'].json['message'] + ' | Call Outcome: ' + $node['Extract Contact Data'].json['call_outcome'] + ' | Interest Level: ' + $node['Extract Contact Data'].json['interest_level']}}
additionalFields.phoneNumber: ={{$node['Extract Contact Data'].json['phone'] !== 'Phone from VAPI call' ? $node['Extract Contact Data'].json['phone'] : ''}}
